title: Nothing is Unique! Gamemode
body:
Hello!

Have you even asked yourself about a _stackable passive_ like the Amor Pen. from {{item:3071}} ? 
That could be if Riot do a Gamemode like this :)

Too OP Items, they may nerfed in this Gamemode:

{{item:3022}} - the 2nd of that do only 50% of the passive

{{item:3057}} - the 2nd of that do only 50% of the passive

{{item:3146}} - the 2nd of that do only 50% of the passive // Yep i copied it ;D

{{item:3085}} - Not stackable!

{{item:3706}} {{item:3711}}{{item:3715}} - Not stackable!

{{item:3075}} - the 2nd of that do only 50% of the passive

{{item:3083}} - Not stackable!


Any more **Nerfed** or maybe **Buffed** item? Comment it please!!

replies.body:

>
> Hello!
> 
> Have you even asked yourself about a _stackable passive_ like the Amor Pen. from {{item:3071}} ? 



PreSeason 3? Was it that?
I have experienced it, and i didn't really like it.
GER forum btw.
